Plot: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.
Title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
Actors: John Neville, Eric Idle, Sarah Polley, Oliver Reed
tomatoConsensus: Bursting with Terry Gilliam's typically imaginative flourishes, this story of a possibly deranged Baron recounting his storied life is a flamboyant and witty visual treat.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
